description:
It`s the day of the ball-sports tournament everyone`s been looking forward to. The athletic Sakura makes a strong showing in the basketball event!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sakura and the Icy Ball-Sports Tournament
Sakura to Koori no Kyuugi Taikai
Sakura y el torneo de deportes sobre hielo
さくらと氷の球技大会
